long_description: From picnic to grocery store, the Green Guru Carbon Cooler single pannier features an insulated design to keep your food protected as you ride and fresh when you arrive. Pannier is made of a combination of polyethelyne and vinyl for durable, weather-ready storage. Insulated large main compartment stows your gear, groceries and other goodies; collapsible design allows for easy storage or transport. Internal mesh pockets help organize your stuff. Top lid secures with rip-and-stick tabs; zip pocket on lid flap keeps small essentials easily accessible. Universal mount system fits most bike racks. Adjustable shoulder strap makes it easy to tote the Carbon Cooler pannier off of the bike. Webbing straps with reflective detailings help enhance your visibility in low light and provide mounting points for rear bike lights (lights sold separately).
short_description: From picnic to grocery store, the Green Guru Carbon Cooler single pannier features an insulated design to keep your food protected as you ride and fresh when you arrive.
